item.source: How do i use hamanchi, just downloaded it

item.title: How do i use hamanchi, just downloaded it
item.dc:creator: @Mladen Mladen
item.description:
@Mladen wrote:

Difficulty: 1/10
Assumed Knowledge:Need to know how to download And read -.-

First Download hamachi :

http://www.hamachi.cc/download/

If u downloaded it then u need to do this :

Open hamachi

if u see this :

click on it then u will see this :

click on Join

Then u will see this :

then enter the network name and pass

up the network name
under the network pass

This is the example of a server :

Now enter the network name and pass and then join =]

If u want to join a no-ip server then u just need to do this :

Enter the no-ip server on the i-p adress

And then u are done =]

How To make a hamachi server :

Purpose: Making hamachi server , if u dont have a router

Difficulty: 3/10

Assumed Knowledge: To read and c+p ( copy and paste )

Server Base: /

Classes Modified: Compile.bat runserver.bat

Procedure

First download hamachi [ http://www.hamachi.cc/download/ ]
Leave hamachi alone now

Step 2

U need to download JDK :

[ http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index_jdk5.jsp ]

Scroll down till u find : JDK Update 5.0 Update 10

JDK 5.0 Update 10 The Java SE Development Kit (JDK) includes: the Java Runtime Environment (JRE) command-line development tools, such as compilers and debuggers, that are necessary or useful for developing applets and applications

Download it .

Step 3 :

Now u need an source :

Project 16 ( If u are good coder then use this one )
CheezScape ( If u are meduim coder Then use this )
Testscape ( if u are starter )

Step 4 :

U need winrar now :
http://www.rarlab.com/download.htm
Download winrar now

Step 5 :

Now we need to compile.bat and runserver.bat

1.Go to ure source
2.Then u need to search for :

Press right mouse button then edit

Then replace all that whit :

@echo off title Runserver set java="C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\java.exe" %java% java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server pause

Now search for this one :

Now replace all that whit :

@echo off title servernamehere java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server

Step 6 :

Now we are almost done u will need people on ure server to
Open up Your Hamachi
On the top of ure hamachi u will see some numbers
That numbers is your i-p adress

Thats what people need to get on a hamachi server
Now Search for this :

If u see it click on it , then click on create new network
Above add ure network name
Down add the pass

Now u are done =]

Read full topic
